quote_last: Mark finished his lunch. Two other men finished their sandwiches and also rose to leave. Mark quickly returned to the Senate, as he wanted to catch Henry Lykham before the floor debate started.
title: Shall We Tell the President?
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: Story in papers about two-year-olds having to take tests to get into nursery school just made me jump out of my skin. Am supposed to be at tea party for godson Harryâ€™s birthday.
title: Bridget Jones's Diary
author: Helen Fielding

quote_last: In my own rooms, but it was less successful, she seemed to have grown less juvenile, more of a woman overnight.
title: Lolita

title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
